message: Very disappointed in Politifact. You post a wide ranging statement. Explain how most of the statement is false then cherry pick out the most factual part of it and rate that part. Sounds simple enough to me.

message: Kerry, regardless of whether SeaWorld captured Tili or not, they were still responsible for holding him, and others, captive for years upon years, with limited food sometimes and left to be tortured by other whales. He was deprived of space and interaction, upon which killer whales are revolved around social activity. SeaWorld have blood on their hands, along with SeaLand who originally captured him and so many others.
